content.subject: URGENT: Verify your AOU Password NOW

mails.body: Your AOU mailbox will be closed in 6 hours. Verify here: http://a0u-security.com/verify to keep access. Do not ignore.
We couldn't process PO#11872. Open the attached 'Invoice.xlsm' and enable macros to review payment details.
You have a new voicemail. Listen securely at http://aou-internal-login.net/audio. Sign in with email and password.
Congratulations! Your bonus is ready. Confirm bank details at http://aou-payroll-support.com to receive funds today.
We closed your ticket. For a small gift card, complete this survey: http://bit.ly/aou-service-review.
Your drive access is disabled due to abnormal activity. Restore at http://aou-restore.info within 30 minutes.
Your password expired. Reset now: http://aou-reset-password.co. Failure to comply results in account lockout.
Please download the attached 'Invite.pdf.exe' for entry QR. Required for Monday's briefing.
I need 10 Apple gift cards in the next hour for VIP guests. Scratch and send codes here. Keep this confidential.
A new device removed your MFA. If this wasn't you, re-enroll at http://secure-aou-auth.com immediately.
Emails to students are bouncing. Reauthenticate mailbox: http://aou-mail-fix.org now to prevent loss of service.
Maria shared 'Q3_Budget.xls'. Sign in via http://aou-finance-share.com to download.
Complete the campus COVID form at http://aou-health-portal.cc or your ID will be deactivated.
Unpaid parking ticket detected. Appeal within 24 hours at http://aou-parking-appeals.com to avoid penalties.
Motion detected in Lab B. View footage: http://aou-cctv.net and log in to confirm your identity.
Migration requires password reconfirmation. Submit here: http://helpdesk-aou.com/upgrade.
You qualify for a refund. Enter bank details at http://aou-refunds.center to receive payment today.
Access invoice: http://onedr1ve-aou.com. Sign in with institutional credentials.
Your payroll info is invalid. Open attachment 'Payroll_Update.htm' and follow steps within.
Your VPN was disabled. Restore now: http://aou-vpn-restore.net to retain remote access.
Restore access by following the steps at http://aou-mail-fix.org/auth within 30 minutes.
Provide bank details at http://aou-mail-fix.org/reset to receive funds. Action required immediately.
Open 'http://aou-finance-share.com/reset' and enable macros to review payment details. Attachment: 'Invite.pdf.exe'.
Download the attached file 'http://onedr1ve-aou.com/login' for your entry pass.
You've received a voice message. Play it: http://a0u-security.com/login - sign in required. Action required immediately.
